sentence: The event comes as Cheney gears up for a tough primary battle for Wyoming's only congressional district in August against a lawyer, Harriet Hageman, endorsed by Trump.
title: Romney, other Trump critics to raise money for Liz Cheney re-election effort

sentence: The $7.2 million raised to date by Cheney is already a record for Wyoming's sole House district, and has given her a big financial edge over her main challenger, land-use lawyer Harriet Hageman, who has pulled in $745,000.
author: Nathan Layne
title: Surge of out-of-state donors boost Trump critic Cheney's campaign -but cannot vote for her

sentence: The $7.2 million raised to date by Cheney is already a record for Wyoming's sole House district, and has given her a big financial edge over her main challenger, land-use lawyer Harriet Hageman, who has pulled in $745,000.
author: Nathan Layne
title: Surge Of Out-of-state Donors Boost Trump Critic Cheney's Campaign -but Cannot Vote For Her

sentence: It's roughly 10 times as much as her Trump-backed primary challenger Harriet Hageman drew.
title: With Liz Cheney's re-election prospects in doubt, her national profile grows

sentence: The cash will likely all be needed as Cheney tries to fend off Trump-backed primary opponent Harriet Hageman, who is hoping to unseat the incumbent by riding the former president's public disdain for her.
title: Cheney capitalizes off national profile to raise $2.9 million in first quarter of 2022
